products.name: Air Core Inductors
products.description: Air Core Inductors are ideal for high-frequency applications where core losses must be minimized. They are lightweight and offer consistent inductance without saturation.

products.name: Charging Coils & Arrays
productDetail: Compact size with high current capability
products.description: Charging coils are specialized inductors used in wireless charging and power transfer systems. They are optimized for efficient energy transfer at varying frequencies.

products.name: Coupled Inductors
products.description: Coupled inductors provide mutual inductance between windings, used in power converters and voltage regulators to enhance performance and efficiency.

products.name: Fixed Value Inductors
products.description: Fixed Value Inductors are designed for general-purpose use in electronic circuits with a constant inductance requirement. They are cost-effective and durable.

products.name: High Frequency Inductors
productDetail: Low core losses and high Q-factor
products.description: High Frequency Inductors are tailored for RF and high-speed signal applications, maintaining low loss and minimal distortion at high frequencies.

products.name: Multilayer Inductors
products.description: Multilayer Inductors offer high inductance density in a tiny footprint, making them suitable for compact circuits and surface mounting.

products.name: Power Inductors
products.description: Power Inductors are built for switching power supplies, DC-DC converters, and voltage regulators. They provide high energy storage and current handling.

products.name: RF Inductor
products.description: RF Inductors are precision components used in RF circuits for impedance matching, signal filtering, and energy storage. Designed for minimal loss.

products.name: Thin Film Inductors
products.description: Thin Film Inductors offer precise and consistent performance for compact circuits, especially in RF and high-speed digital applications.

products.name: Toroidal Inductors
productDetail: High energy storage in compact size
products.description: Toroidal Inductors are known for their efficient magnetic containment and minimal leakage. Ideal for power conversion and filtering.
